## ChatEventClient.emit() method

Emits an event with the specified name and data, triggering all registered listeners for that event.

**Signature:**

```typescript
emit(eventName: string, data: any): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The name of the event to emit.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

data


</td><td>

any


</td><td>

The data to be passed to the event listeners.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void
